channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-24809] Build failure while resolving javax.el dependency
item.description:
The Hive build (mvn clean install -DskipTests) fails while trying to resolve a transitive dependency to org.glassfish:javax.el:jar:3.0.1-b06-SNAPSHOT. 

[INFO] Reactor Summary:
[INFO] 
[INFO] Hive Storage API 2.7.3-SNAPSHOT .................... SUCCESS [  2.906 s]

[ERROR] 
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/DependencyResolutionException
[ERROR] 
[ERROR] After correcting the problems, you can resume the build with the command
[ERROR]   mvn <args> -rf :metastore-tools-common

The error occurs only when there are multiple repositories in the local maven settings file (~/.m2/settings.xml).
item.summary: Build failure while resolving javax.el dependency

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Although the problem manifestates only in certain configurations the dependency shouldn't be fetched in the first place. In multiple places we explicitly exclude org.glassfish.web:javax.servlet.jsp to avoid problems of this nature (see HIVE-19579).
